name: Space Escape - A VR Escape Room (HTC Vive & Oculus)
name_original: Space Escape - A VR Escape Room (HTC Vive & Oculus)
description:
This is an Escape Game I'm working on. It's free in exchange for Feedback. It's about an hour, record is 55 minutes.

The first Escape Room in our series is set in space. Here, the player must use colour combinations and his combinatorial skills to escape from the station and set off on a journey to strange worlds. To do so, he must find 4 key artifacts and use them in the main console.

Dear traveller,

The time has come. Go to space station goliath, break the Code and meet the commander. He will give you instructions and show you to your cabin. He may not be the kindest, but he certainly Is the best in his field. You'll sleep there for the first Five nights, or Six earth days. Successfully mastering your last task, finding the Three lost artefacts, has not gone unnoticed. So go through this station and use your skills to get to the shuttle that will take you to the station goliath.

We wish you good luck with your mission! We expect Zero mistakes.
